definitions.definition: A fish of the order Pleuronectiformes , the adults of which have both eyes on one side and usually swim with the other side down, such as a flounder , a halibut , or a sole .

main_definition: A fish of the order Pleuronectiformes , the adults of which have both eyes on one side and usually swim with the other side down, such as a flounder , a halibut , or a sole .
